dict.acceptation: 建议，提议；暗示；使想起；启示；

sent.orig: The green gables on the Anne is too attractive, I suggest you also see the book.
sent.trans: 《绿山墙的安妮》对我太有吸引力了，建议大家也看看这本书。

sent.orig: I am not aware of this project and suggest that you refer to the relevant company.
sent.trans: 我不掌握你所说的这个合作项目，建议你向有关公司询问。

sent.orig: I suggest that we let the matter drop for a few days.
sent.trans: 我建议暂时不谈这件事，过几天再说。

sent.orig: At the risk of overstepping my boundaries, allow me to suggest that you _.
sent.trans: 请原谅我的造次，不外我建议你_。

sent.orig: These experiments suggest how different policy regimes cope with an uncertain world.
sent.trans: 这些实验演示了政策体系是如何随着世界的变化而变化的。
